[Home](./index.md) &gt; [lgpio](./lgpio.md) &gt; [i2cWriteQuick](./lgpio.i2cwritequick.md)

## i2cWriteQuick() function

This sends a single bit (in the Rd/Wr bit) to the device.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function i2cWriteQuick(handle: number, bitVal: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  handle | number | The I2C device handle as returned by [i2cOpen()](./lgpio.i2copen.md) |
|  bitVal | number | 0-1, the value to write |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
